languages.text: "Основатель станции, господин Парсимус, страстно грезил великим будущим своего детища. В этом буклете подробно расписано, каким должен был стать Футфол после завершения строительства. Десятки астероидов, превращенных в великолепные дворцы и храмы! Гигантские мосты, тянущиеся прямо через пустоту! А эти дивные контрфорсы и аркбутаны? Архивольты внешних арок, изящная вязь балюстрад?"

"Footfall's founder, Lord Parsimus, was obsessed with his creation's grand future. This booklet describes in detail what Footfall was meant to become upon its completion. Dozens of asteroids turned into glorious palaces and temples! Massive bridges spanning the void itself! And the marvellous flying buttresses! The archivolts of the exterior arches, the elegant arrangement of balusters!"
languages.original_text: "Основатель станции, господин Парсимус, страстно грезил великим будущим своего детища. В этом буклете подробно расписано, каким должен был стать Футфол после завершения строительства. Десятки астероидов, превращенных в великолепные дворцы и храмы! Гигантские мосты, тянущиеся прямо через пустоту! А эти дивные контрфорсы и аркбутаны? Архивольты внешних арок, изящная вязь балюстрад?"

Dozens of asteroids turned into glorious palaces and temples! Massive bridges spanning over the void itself! And the marvellous flying buttresses! The archivolts of the exterior arches, the elegant arrangement of balusters!"

Dozens of asteroids turned into glorious palaces and temples! Massive bridges spanning the void itself! And the marvellous flying buttresses! The archivolts of the exterior arches, the elegant arrangement of balusters!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: 「フットフォールの創設者であるロード・パルシムスは自身の作品に待ち受ける偉大な未来に固執していました。この小冊子には、フットフォールの完成後の姿が詳細に書かれています。何十個もの小惑星を用いた壮麗な宮廷や寺院！ヴォイドそのものにかかる巨大な橋！目を見張るような空飛ぶ控え壁！屋外アーチの飾り迫縁や、上品に配置された手すり子！」
languages.original_text: "Footfall's founder, Lord Parsimus, was obsessed with his creation's grand future. This booklet describes in detail what Footfall was meant to become upon its completion. Dozens of asteroids turned into glorious palaces and temples! Massive bridges spanning the void itself! And the marvellous flying buttresses! The archivolts of the exterior arches, the elegant arrangement of balusters!"

traits.locale_text: 「フットフォールの創設者であるロード・パルシムスは自身の作品に待ち受ける偉大な未来に固執していました。この小冊子には、フットフォールの完成後の姿が詳細に書かれています。何十個もの小惑星を用いた壮麗な宮廷や寺院！ヴォイドそのものにかかる巨大な橋！目を見張るような空飛ぶ控え壁！屋外アーチの飾り迫縁や、上品に配置された手すり子！」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: “落脚港的创造者帕西姆斯领主痴迷于他的杰作，痴迷于这座星站宏伟的未来。这本小册子详细描述了落脚港完工之后的样子。数十颗小行星，共同构成了辉煌的宫殿和神殿！巨大的桥梁横跨虚空！还有那些神奇的飞扶壁！更不用提那拱形的外墙与优雅的护栏！”
languages.original_text: "Footfall's founder, Lord Parsimus, was obsessed with his creation's grand future. This booklet describes in detail what Footfall was meant to become upon its completion. Dozens of asteroids turned into glorious palaces and temples! Massive bridges spanning the void itself! And the marvellous flying buttresses! The archivolts of the exterior arches, the elegant arrangement of balusters!"

traits.locale_text: “落脚港的创造者帕西姆斯领主痴迷于他的杰作，痴迷于这座星站宏伟的未来。这本小册子详细描述了落脚港完工之后的样子。数十颗小行星，共同构成了辉煌的宫殿和神殿！巨大的桥梁横跨虚空！还有那些神奇的飞扶壁！更不用提那拱形的外墙与优雅的护栏！”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: «El fundador de Paso, lord Parsimus, estaba obsesionado con el futuro de su creación. Este folleto describe en detalle qué aspecto iba a tener Paso cuando se terminara de construir. ¡Docenas de asteroides convertidos en gloriosos palacios y templos! ¡Grandes puentes que cruzaban el vacío! ¡Y unos arbotantes de ensueño! Mire qué arquivoltas en los arcos exteriores, ¡la elegante disposición de los balaustres!».
languages.original_text: "Footfall's founder, Lord Parsimus, was obsessed with his creation's grand future. This booklet describes in detail what Footfall was meant to become upon its completion. Dozens of asteroids turned into glorious palaces and temples! Massive bridges spanning the void itself! And the marvellous flying buttresses! The archivolts of the exterior arches, the elegant arrangement of balusters!"

traits.locale_text: «El fundador de Paso, lord Parsimus, estaba obsesionado con el futuro de su creación. Este folleto describe en detalle qué aspecto iba a tener Paso cuando se terminara de construir. ¡Docenas de asteroides convertidos en gloriosos palacios y templos! ¡Grandes puentes que cruzaban el vacío! ¡Y unos arbotantes de ensueño! Mire qué arquivoltas en los arcos exteriores, ¡la elegante disposición de los balaustres!».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: « Le seigneur Parsimus, le fondateur de Castel, était obnubilé par l'avenir grandiose de sa création. Cet opuscule décrit en détail ce que la station était censée devenir, une fois terminée : des dizaines d'astéroïdes transformés en autant de temples et de palais mirifiques ! Des ponts titanesques s'élançant dans le vide ! D'incroyables contreforts volants ! Ah, les archivoltes des arches extérieures et la disposition, si élégante, des balustres ! »
languages.original_text: "Footfall's founder, Lord Parsimus, was obsessed with his creation's grand future. This booklet describes in detail what Footfall was meant to become upon its completion. Dozens of asteroids turned into glorious palaces and temples! Massive bridges spanning the void itself! And the marvellous flying buttresses! The archivolts of the exterior arches, the elegant arrangement of balusters!"

traits.locale_text: « Le seigneur Parsimus, le fondateur de Castel, était obnubilé par l'avenir grandiose de sa création. Cet opuscule décrit en détail ce que la station était censée devenir, une fois terminée : des dizaines d'astéroïdes transformés en autant de temples et de palais mirifiques ! Des ponts titanesques s'élançant dans le vide ! D'incroyables contreforts volants ! Ah, les archivoltes des arches extérieures et la disposition, si élégante, des balustres ! »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: "Footfalls Gründer, Lord Parsimus, war besessen von der großen Zukunft seiner Schöpfung. Dieses Büchlein beschreibt im Detail, was aus Footfall nach seiner Fertigstellung werden sollte. Aus Dutzenden von Asteroiden würden grandiose Paläste und Tempel! Gewaltige Brücken überspannen die Leere selbst! Und die wundersamen fliegenden Stützpfeiler! Die Archivolten der äußeren Bögen, das elefantöse Arrangement von Geländersäulen!"
languages.original_text: "Footfall's founder, Lord Parsimus, was obsessed with his creation's grand future. This booklet describes in detail what Footfall was meant to become upon its completion. Dozens of asteroids turned into glorious palaces and temples! Massive bridges spanning the void itself! And the marvellous flying buttresses! The archivolts of the exterior arches, the elegant arrangement of balusters!"

traits.locale_text: "Footfalls Gründer, Lord Parsimus, war besessen von der großen Zukunft seiner Schöpfung. Dieses Büchlein beschreibt im Detail, was aus Footfall nach seiner Fertigstellung werden sollte. Aus Dutzenden von Asteroiden würden grandiose Paläste und Tempel! Gewaltige Brücken überspannen die Leere selbst! Und die wundersamen fliegenden Stützpfeiler! Die Archivolten der äußeren Bögen, das elefantöse Arrangement von Geländersäulen!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian

languages.text: "Binliman'ın kurucusu Lord Parsimus, görkemli bir eser ortaya koymayı kafayı takmıştı. Bu kitapçıkta, tamamlandığında Binliman'ın nasıl bir yer olmasının planlandığı ayrıntılı olarak anlatılıyor. İhtişamlı saray ve tapınaklara dönüştürülecek onlarca asteroit! Uçsuz boyunca uzanacak devasa köprüler! Hele o uçan fevkalade payandalar yok mu! Dıştaki kemer alınları, zarif korkuluk aranjmanları!"
languages.original_text: "Footfall's founder, Lord Parsimus, was obsessed with his creation's grand future. This booklet describes in detail what Footfall was meant to become upon its completion. Dozens of asteroids turned into glorious palaces and temples! Massive bridges spanning the void itself! And the marvellous flying buttresses! The archivolts of the exterior arches, the elegant arrangement of balusters!"

traits.locale_text: "Binliman'ın kurucusu olan Lord Parsimus, eserinin görkemli bir geleceği olmasına kafayı takmıştı. Bu kitapçıkta, tamamlandığında Binliman'ın nasıl bir yer olmasının planlandığı ayrıntılı olarak anlatılıyor. Onlarca gök taşı, ihtişamlı saraylara ve tapınaklara dönüştürülecekmiş! Uçsuza kadar uzanan devasa köprüler inşa edilecekmiş! Hele bir de o fevkalade uçan payandalar yok mu! Dıştaki kemer alınları, zarif korkuluk aranjmanı!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Historian
